name: SPACE BLASTER 8 BIT (itch)
description:
■  They have briefly left by your ship in an asteroid Hagel theirs. Now you have landed to hostile area. Now you must only survive.

■ They have briefly left by your ship in an asteroid Hagel theirs. Now you have landed to hostile area. Now you must only survive.

■ Their ship is a movement in duration. They must navigate her ship themselves.

■ The ship automatically shoots.

■ Collect mighty power ups!

Minimum System Requirements:

Windows/PC

  • OS: Windows XP > 10
  • Processor:  500mb Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 mb Nvidia or ATI graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 mb available space
  • Controls: Keyboard & mouse
